text:
Can anyone on Windows replicate this? (I get this in GH actions, you might(?) need mingw for `cat`):
```julia> write("foo", "foo")
3

julia> sprint() do io
           run(pipeline(ignorestatus(`cat foo`); stdout=io))
       end
""

julia> sprint() do io
           run(pipeline(ignorestatus(`cat foo`); stdout=io))
       end
"foo"```

text:
```julia> sprint() do io
           run(pipeline(`echo foo`; stdout=io))
       end
""

julia> sprint() do io
           run(pipeline(`echo foo`; stdout=io))
       end
"foo\n"```
